main event: A witness in Reading, Pennsylvania reported seeing a brilliantly glowing object moving rapidly across the sky on the evening of May 10, 1954.
interesting points: The object appeared to be moving in a circular orbit and changed speed and elevation,The witness observed the object for about 5 to 10 minutes before it took off at high speed toward the northeast,There were other witnesses present in the area at the time of the sighting,The witness stated that the object's motion was unlike any known aircraft,The conclusion of the report suggested it might possibly be an aircraft.
sighted object: a brilliantly glowing object in the sky
witness description: saw a rapidly moving light that appeared like a star or planet, with unusual motion
